definitions.definition: To cause (someone or something) to undergo a particular experience, especially one that is unpleasant or unwanted.
examples: I came here to buy souvenirs, not to be subjected to a tirade of abuse!

definitions.definition: To make subordinate or subservient ; to subdue or enslave .

main_definition: ( transitive , construed with to ) To cause (someone or something) to undergo a particular experience, especially one that is unpleasant or unwanted.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make subordinate or subservient ; to subdue or enslave .
